Configure weekly and daily schedule: sta: Настройка еженедельного и ежедневного расписания: режим ожидания режима камеры / записи.
While scheduler is turned off, selected: В то время как планировщик выключен, выбраный режим применяется все время.
Better image quality can be obtained wit: Better image quality can be obtained with larger resolution, while it increases storage and network bandwidth consumption.
Higher quality setting produces better i: Higher quality setting produces better images with more storage and network consumption inevitably.
Turn on Rotate setting when the image co: Turn on Rotate setting when the image come upside-down. It flips the image horizontally and vertically.
Night vision is used to get black and wh: Night vision is used to get black and white image in low illumination environment.
Controls the volume of camera’s speaker.
Controls the sensitivity of camera’s mic: Controls the sensitivity of camera’s mic.
Push alarms are sent to your mobile devi: Push alarms are sent to your mobile devices when motion activity are detected in the camera.
Push alarms are sent to your mobile devices when sound activity are detected in the camera.
Name: Name
Describe your camera name or installed l: Describe your camera name or installed location
Camera’s status LED can be turned off if: Status LED of the camera can be turned off if unwanted
Correct configuration of camera’s time z: Correct configuration of camera’s time zone is essential to view recorded data with correct time.

change_password_restrict_letter: Пароль должен содержать как минимум одну букву
change_password_restrict_special_charact: Пароль должен содержать как минимум один специальный символ
change_password_restrict_length: Пароль должен быть не меньше 8 символов
change_password_match: Нельзя изменить пароль на тот же самый

menu_p2p_streaming_description: Хранение видео и вещание потока может быть либо с камеры, либо с облака. При этом настройки планировщика будут сброшены по умолчанию.
